summary: well this is a performance setting for skyrim for low spec computers that worked for my toaster
descriptionHtml:
one or two days ago i was playing fallout 3 nothing too special but after the game crashed on me i tried to optimize it by tweaking the ini files found
a forum to help me do thisÂ  then it worked then i slept

AND I SWEAR THAT once i slept old sheogorath gave me the idea that many of fallout 3's setting would still work on skyrim and it did i think then after that setting s from oblivion and morrowind though i dont know if it works on your machine but hope it helps still working on it


to install
rule 1 backup your old ini files located in you mygames\skyrim folder

rule 2 jus drop these in that folder


if you know more about these setting i would like to know more about them
author: zeroui7
